com.fasterxml.storemate.shared

Interface StartAndStoppable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BDBLastAccessStoreImpl, BDBNodeStateStoreImpl, LastAccessStore, LevelDBLastAccessStore, LevelDBNodeStateStore, NodeStateStore

    public interface StartAndStoppable
    Simple add-on interface, to denote things are to be managed according to life-cycle of container. This is typically implemented by service components, but may also be used by client-side components when there is costly state to initialize and maintain.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void prepareForStop()
      Method called before stop(), and is meant to start graceful shutdown.
      void start()
      Method called when the component should start its operation.
      void stop()
      Method called when the component is to shut down; follows call to prepareForStop(), possibly with some delay.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
           throws Exception
        Method called when the component should start its operation. This occurs after initialization (if any; and out of scope for this interface)
        Throws:
        Exception

      • prepareForStop

        void prepareForStop()
                    throws Exception
        Method called before stop(), and is meant to start graceful shutdown.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • stop

        void stop()
          throws Exception
        Method called when the component is to shut down; follows call to prepareForStop(), possibly with some delay.
        Throws:
        Exception
